generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings, clearly designated for vehicle traffic, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: On both sides of the road, there are elevated walkways with curbs, designed for pedestrians, visible on the left and right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a clear, open sky without clouds or obstructions.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk to the left side of the road.
- car: A silver car is visible ahead, driving on the road in the same direction as the viewpoint.
- pole: Multiple tall, vertical poles are visible along the road, supporting streetlights and flags.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the right side of the road, separating it from the vegetation.
- wall: A concrete wall runs along the right side of the road, acting as a barrier.
